named-query.name: getAllDescriptions
named-query.query: select d from EventDesc d order by d.title

named-query.name: getActiveDescriptions
named-query.query: select d from EventDesc d where d.active = true order by d.title

named-query.name: getAllEventTypes
named-query.query: select t from EventType t order by t.title

named-query.name: getAllLocations
named-query.query: select l from EventLocation l order by l.title

named-query.name: getAllSeasons
named-query.query: select s from EventSeason s order by s.listOrder, s.title

named-query.name: getAllMembers
named-query.query: select m from Member m order by m.lastName, m.firstName

named-query.name: getAllDirectors
named-query.query: select d from Member d where d.raceDirector = true order by d.lastName, d.firstName

named-query.name: getFutureEvents
named-query.query: select e from Event e where e.date >= :date

named-query.name: getHistoricEvents
named-query.query: select e from Event e where e.date < :date order by e.date desc
